reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We loved this hotel. It was very nice and had all the amenities. We would definitely stay there again. A big plus was that there were several nice restaurants within walking distance.
reviews.title: Very good experience, friendly staff

likes.liked: — size of the room and the amenities

reviews.text: This hotel was super clean, had a great breakfast, the front desk staff was so great. The first morning housekeeping was there and did a great job. The next day when I went to my room after housekeeping had been there, my chanel sunglasses I had so stupidly left on the table were gone. Then the next day my expensive designer swimsuit I had left hanging to dry on the back of the door was also gone for good. I checked with the front desk when I checked out, 3 days later, 2 weeks after that , and again a month later just to see if anyone had turned them in.
reviews.title: Great hotel...but keep your stuff locked up!

likes.liked: — The rooms were huge and nicely laid out!!!
likes.disliked: — The bath tub was super small!

reviews.text: All in all the hotel was great....just keep your stuff you would miss if it was stolen LOCKED UP!!!
reviews.title: Very contemporary roooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel has been recently updated. For a family of 5 it's great since it has a sofa bed in the suite area. Very contemporary style.
reviews.title: Wonderful Hotel

reviews.text: The breakfast was very good, lots of choice and hot waffles always a treat.
reviews.title: Excellent

likes.liked: — Clean, bright, excellent breakfast, exceptional staff
likes.disliked: — A little tricky to drive in and out of -- odd little side street entrance

reviews.text: if all hotels were of this quality, traveling would be painless!!!
reviews.title: the best

likes.liked: — walking distance to several excellent resturants

reviews.text: everything was so perfect!!!!!
reviews.title: best place to stay in Billings

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We travel to Billings several times a year, and have stayed at almost every hotel in Billings. This one is the best, I am a travel agent and recommend this hotel often. The beds are amazing, the rooms are clean. The breakfast is hot, and the selection is good. The location is very good for shopping and dinning. My only complaint would be not enough tables in the breakfast area. The price is one of the highest in the area, but you get what you pay for. What you are paying for is one of the best rooms in town.
reviews.title: Very good choice
Pretty Good Stay
reviews.text: We spent 2 nights here,and were pleased with the room.

reviews.title: Best Around
reviews.text: New,clean,nicely decorated -and a VERY comfortable bed--the best of our trip!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Spring Hills Suites is a nice find in Billings. While this hotel is one of many motels immediately off the freeway in the western side of Billings this one stands out. First of all upon entering the hotel we were warmly greeted by an older woman and man who were working the front desk on a late Saturday night. They made sure our accomodations were proper and were also willing to change the room to a higher floor. The room itself was modern and clean. There was a refrigerator in the room, a nice touch since most of the hotels in Montana do not offer such a service or if they do at a higher price. The tv remote control did not work but when I asked the front staff about it they immediately gave me a new remote without returning the old one. The bed was comfortable and contained upgraded sheets and blankets. The staff were also helpful in giving us directions and recommendations at what to eat at a restaurant we had picked out in the area. The complimentary breakfast in the morning was good and again all of the staff were helpful. The fitness center was also well maintained and stayed open late at night.
reviews.title: Nice Find In Billings

reviews.text: We have stayed here many times since this hotel opened a couple years ago and it had been a while since our last visit. We stayed three nights Sept 20-23 in a double bedded suite. This hotel continues to hold up very well. The rooms are very clean and the beds are so comfortable with multiple layers of sheets, duvet and five pillows.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel Terrific Staff

likes.disliked: — sheets kept coming off the mattress at night

reviews.text: The service continues to be awesome with very friendly check-in and always a smile and hello when you walk past to enter/leave. The staff is actually the same as in our past stays. It is always a good sign when there isn't a big employee turnover.
reviews.title: Decent Place But Bad Clientele

reviews.text: Location is great. A very short drive to the mall if you take 18th St in front of the hotel to Monad, much shorter than taking King Ave W. We have never had any problems with noise from the train.
reviews.title: Nice, clean room; good bfast...but..

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Typical above average quality as offered by Spring Hill Hotels.
reviews.title: Loved the Spring Hill Suites

reviews.text: Over the years, we've probably stayed in most of the hotels Billings has to offer. In our opinion, this is the cream of the crop. Brand new, expensively-furnished, and immaculately clean, I can't imagine how anyone couldn't think this place was great. The granite countertops in the bathroom and kitchenette (w/sink, dorm-size frig, and microwave) areas, the cherry furniture, the classy artwork, the pillowtop mattresses and beautiful linens all make this such a comfortable place to stay. It's basically more like a small condo than a hotel room. Although it doesn't have a restaurant, next door are Hu Hot Mongolian BBQ for lunch and dinner as well as Texas Roadhouse for dinner. Other than that, you've got to drive for meals but there are numerous selections within a mile. The free breakfast is pretty much standard fare but sitting in the beautiful surroundings, who cares? I expect this will be our new favorite place to stay on our frequent outings to Billings.
reviews.title: Best in Billings!
Loved it!
reviews.text: Clean, great service and wonderful stay! I travel a LOT and this hotel really was a nice surprise, very clean and quiet.
We were very impressed with this SpringHill Suites in Billings. The hotel is now about 9 months old. It has a very modern decor, the quality and cleanliness are up to Marriott's high standards.
reviews.title: Great Hotel. Beautiful Rooms.

reviews.text: The staff at the hotel were also very friendly.
reviews.title: Okay for a couple nights

reviews.text: We stayed here last summer on vacation. I thought the beds were comfortable. I was disappointed however that the refrigerator wasn't working. We had to buy ice for the coolers and throw some food out . They said they couldn't do much about it. The staff otherwise was helpful.
reviews.title: Poor Service At A Pretty Hotel
